entry.title: My 8 Favorite Drone videos filmed and chosen by Me, Myself and I
entry.summary:
So here is a story for you. A few years ago, after I left my career in Silicon Valley, I decided to break bad üòÇ. I know, it sounds silly, but hey, I had fun. I spent almost two years being a full-time traveler (part-time remote-located engineer and part-time having-so-much-freakin-fun).

Here is my top drone videos from those wild times:

1. Hawai‚Äôi Aerial Reel

Living in Hawaii for almost 5 months in 4 different occasions freed my soul for good (whatever this means).

The droning in this "reel" is so so beautiful, and it was so much fun to film.

I will never forget those days üíñ.

2. Life is all about you & Not at all about you

I just love this song by Zhu. I can listen to it over and over.

But the droning in this video is also really special to me because it was my first summer in SoCal üå¥.

3. Santa Monica Daze

S-O M-U-C-H F-E-E-L-Z.

I can't even.

4. Tiny Jaws

I always really wanted to go to Maui, it was itching.

So I took two weeks off my job at Surfline in Huntington Beach and just travelled to a random hostel in Lahaina.

It turned out that I was on the other side of the island from Jaws, which was the place I really wanted to drone.

I longboarded for hours with my drone in my backpack and a killer hot sun on my face.

I almost died to find the place but it was soooo worth it üòé.

5. Go Skateboarding Day w/ Sierra Prescott

So I met this crazy good and famous LA local skateboarder and we hung out üê∞.

Good summer times with some badass LA gals.

6. Surf & Chill in Malibu

Malibu :).

Thank you & Godspeed, Z.

PS: I had a website miasteinkirch.com once and this was the opening (and 3k people loaded it? Waaaaat!)

7. Haleiwa Dreams

One of the best days of my life was when I was living in Haleiwa.

Everything was magical and colorful.

Surfing was so tight.

This video is actually called mia's dreams ‚ú®

8. Longboarding Haleiwa

OK, the surf sucks because there were no waves but this video still gives me the chills.

I was 100% happy and this is not easy as a human in 2018.

Plus, Post Malone wrote this song for me. ‚ò†Ô∏è

Bonus: These ones are just hilariously bad and good, I don't know ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄ

It‚Äôs Summer in the Pipe!

Surfing Venice Beach

Skateboarding the Pipeline

Skateboarding Poods

Wake up High in Encinitas

I dunno, have fun, work hard, be yourself, and stay rebel? ü§òüèº

Aloha, bt3

entry.title: That's What Love Looks Like
entry.summary:
I'm talking about this day that was all about love.

I am not actually talking, I'm showing my pictures.

The People's Climate March, which happened a couple of weeks ago in NYC, filled my veins with hope. No words are able to express what each of these pictures say.

The rest of the pictures (and in larger resolution) are here (flickr) or here (behance). Peace.

Aloha, bt3
